mapper.select: select (board_title, board_content, board_category, board_way, board_recruit_number, board_start_date, board_period, board_views, board_contact) from tbl_board
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (board_title, board_content, board_category, board_way, board_recruit_number, board_start_date, board_period, board_contact, board_company, user_number) values(#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardWay}, #{boardRecruitNumber}, #{boardStartDate}, #{boardPeriod}, #{boardContact}, #{boardCompany}, #{userNumber})
mapper.select: select company_name from tbl_user_company uc join tbl_company c on uc.company_number = c.company_number where user_number = #{userNumber}

select user_nickname, user_file, b.user_number, b.board_number, board_title, board_content , board_category , board_way , board_recruit_number, board_support, board_start_date , board_date , board_period , board_contact, board_company from tbl_board b join tbl_user u on b.user_number = u.user_number where board_number = #{boardNumber}
select company_file FROM tbl_company c join tbl_board b on c.company_name = b.board_company where board_number = #{boardNumber}
select board_title, board_number from tbl_board order by board_number desc
